sentence.Network_en: "Morris" is an English corruption of "Moorish", meaning North African.
sentence.Network_cn: Morris在英语中是Moorish的变体，意思是“北非的”。

sentence.Network_en: There was great excitement among the Moorish people at the waterside.
sentence.Network_cn: 海边的摩尔人一阵轰动.

sentence.Network_en: All the doors are arched with the special arch we see in Moorish pictures.
sentence.Network_cn: 门户造成拱形,形状独特,跟摩尔风暴画片里所见的一样.

entry.tran: 摩尔人的(公元8至15世纪在北非和西班牙具有伊斯兰教文明特点的)
entry.def: Something that is Moorish belongs to or is characteristic of the Muslim civilization in North Africa and Spain between the 8th and the 15th century A.D.

means.word_mean: 1. a style of architecture common in Spain from the 13th to 16th centuries; characterized by the horseshoe (Moorish) arch
1. relating to or characteristic of the Moors;
